title: Customize Your Clan
subTitle: Give your new clan a personality with a name and an icon. You can always change it later.
byCreatingClan: By creating a clan, you agree to Mezon's
errorMessage: Please enter a valid clan name (max 64 characters, only words, numbers, _ or -).

createCategoryModal.title: Create Category
createCategoryModal.privateDescription: By making a category private, only select members and roles will be able to view this category. Synced channels in this category will automatically match to this setting
createCategoryModal.invalidName: Please enter a valid category name (max 64 characters, only words, numbers, _ or -).
createCategoryModal.duplicateName: The category name already exists in the clan. Please enter another name.
